TopicTitle: Giant Bomb Quick Look of Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
I've been a fan of Giant Bomb for a long time. They've looked at KSP before with hilarious / frustrating results. Here's their Quick Look of 1.0.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RadqVolGrds?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

- - - Updated - - -

Some interesting comments on the site:

**@Bollard**: This is the second video in the last week where an "Unfinished" has been referred to as a "Quick Look". Stop with the brand confusion!

**@bwheeler**: @Bollard The game was released a week and a half ago. It's finished!

**@Humanity**: @Bollard But Kerbal is finished now!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T15:49:35Z" title="05/08/2015 03:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by klgraham1013**
